response.original_title: Shine: An Unauthorized Story on Beyoncé
response.overview: This unauthorized "docu-ography" of an entertainment icon peels back the layers of glitter and glam to reveal the hard-working artist behind the Beyoncé name, a gifted performer who started singing and dancing as a child to treat shyness. Her fans might know her as "Sasha Fierce," but the remarkably humble Beyoncé Knowles bears little resemblance to the sassy onstage persona she's often confused with.
response.title: Shine: An Unauthorized Story on Beyoncé
